title: How to Make a Chicken Burrito

steps.headline: Heat a pot over medium heat.
steps.description: Add the tomatoes, chicken, bell pepper, onions, salt, and pepper to the pot.

steps.headline: Mix and coat the chicken with the ingredients.
steps.description: Cover the pot with a lid and cook for 45 minutes. Stir occasionally to allow the chicken to braise.

steps.headline: Remove from the heat and allow the chicken to cool.
Shred the chicken into pieces with your hands or a fork
Heat the refried beans in a saucepan over medium heat for 5 minutes or until it gets warm.
Use a frying pan or griddle to heat the flour tortillas.
steps.description: Fry for a minute on both sides for each tortilla.

steps.headline: Spoon a scoopful of beans in the center of the tortilla.
Add about a cup of the chicken mix to the tortilla.
steps.description: Sprinkle this out along the refried beans.

steps.headline: Add your toppings.
steps.description: Go zesty with your burrito and pile on the guacamole, salsa, and sour cream.

steps.headline: Fold in each side of the tortilla.
steps.description: While applying pressure around the middle, fold the piece closest to you over the center of the tortilla. Just continue to roll the tortilla over until the center is resting on the other end of the tortilla.

text: Heat a pot over medium heat. Add the tomatoes, chicken, bell pepper, onions, salt, and pepper to the pot. Mix and coat the chicken with the ingredients. Cover the pot with a lid and cook for 45 minutes. Stir occasionally to allow the chicken to braise. Remove from the heat and allow the chicken to cool.  Shred the chicken into pieces with your hands or a fork  Heat the refried beans in a saucepan over medium heat for 5 minutes or until it gets warm.  Use a frying pan or griddle to heat the flour tortillas. Fry for a minute on both sides for each tortilla. Spoon a scoopful of beans in the center of the tortilla. Spread it out vertically. Add about a cup of the chicken mix to the tortilla. Sprinkle this out along the refried beans. Add your toppings. Go zesty with your burrito and pile on the guacamole, salsa, and sour cream. Fold in each side of the tortilla. While applying pressure around the middle, fold the piece closest to you over the center of the tortilla. Just continue to roll the tortilla over until the center is resting on the other end of the tortilla. Finished.
